They do not believe in the unknown\nand do not avoid the evil. They act on the doubts and tread in (the way\nof) their passions. For them good is whatever they consider good and\nevil is whatever they consider evil."}]},{"type":"element","tag":"p","props":{},"children":[{"type":"text","value":"Their reliance for resolving distresses is on themselves.
